    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Application
    Represents a student application for an internship.
    ApplicationController
    Controller class that handles all Application-related logic.
    ApplicationCsvHandler
    CSV handler for Application model.
    ApplicationFormatter
    Default implementation for application formatting.
    ApplicationStatus
    Enumeration of possible application statuses.
    BaseUserController
    Base abstract class for user controllers providing common functionality.
    BaseView
    Base class for all views - concise implementation.
    CompanyRepDashboardStrategy
    Concrete strategy for company representative dashboard.
    CompanyRepresentative
    Represents a company representative who can create and manage internship opportunities.
    CompanyRepresentativeController
    Controller for company representative-specific operations.
    CompanyRepresentativeView
    View class for company representative dashboard and operations.
    CsvHandler<T>
    Interface for converting objects to CSV format.
    DashboardContext
    Context class for dashboard strategy pattern.
    DashboardStrategy
    Strategy interface for different user dashboard behaviors.
    FilterConstants
    Constants for filter operations.
    FilterFormatter
    Default implementation for filter settings formatting.
    FilterMenu
    Reusable component for filter menu UI.
    FilterSettings
    Reusable component to store filter settings for internship listings.
    Formatter
    Interface for reusable formatting components.
    Internship
    Represents an internship opportunity in the system.
    InternshipController
    Controller class that handles all Internship-related logic.
    InternshipCsvHandler
    CSV handler for Internship model.
    InternshipFilter
    Reusable component for filtering and sorting internships.
    InternshipFormatter
    Default implementation for internship formatting.
    InternshipStatus
    Enumeration of possible internship statuses.
    LoginController
    Controller for handling user authentication and registration operations.
    LoginView
    View for login, registration, and password change functionality.
    MenuConstants
    Constants for menu choices, field indices, and table navigation.
    MenuOption
    Represents a menu option with a description and callback action.
    Staff
    Represents a staff member who manages the internship system.
    StaffApprovalStatus
    Enumeration of staff approval statuses.
    StaffController
    Controller for staff-specific operations.
    StaffDashboardStrategy
    Concrete strategy for staff dashboard.
    StaffView
    View class for career center staff dashboard and operations.
    Student
    Represents a student user who can apply for internships.
    StudentController
    Controller for student-specific operations.
    StudentDashboardStrategy
    Concrete strategy for student dashboard.
    StudentView
    View class for student dashboard and operations.
    TableFormatter
    Table formatter utility for consistent table layouts.
    TableView
    Table view component - handles table display and pagination.
    User
    Abstract base class representing a user in the Internship Placement System.
    UserController
    Interface defining common operations for all user controllers.
    UserCsvHandler
    CSV handler for User model persistence.
    UserFactory
    Factory class for creating User instances from CSV data.
    UserFormatter
    Default implementation for user/profile formatting.
    UserRegistry
    Central database for all users in the system.
    UserType
    Enumeration of user types in the system.
    ValidationHelper
    Utility class for input validation.
    ViewFactory
    Factory class for creating dashboard strategies based on user type.
    ViewFormatter
    Reusable component for all view display operations.
